about_the_game:
The world of Dice & Spells is obscured by darkness. Undead woke up and started bloodthirsty fights, now everyone is in danger. Only you can stop them. Collect the remaining heroes and stop the evil with joint efforts!

Thanks to the magic dice, you can use the mighty power hidden in them. Use them wisely, and no one will stand against you!

Epic Combat Battle
Gather a group of 4 heroes and defeat the Undead forces together. Prepare the right resources, develop honest tactics, and use magic dice to restore order worldwide.

Become a Legend
Gain valuable experience points and invest them in the development of your hero. Adapt your requirements to the needs of the battlefield.

Feel the Power
Defeat your enemies with magic dice. Each of them has different uses and firepower. Upgrade them and gradually try to use their power.

Heroes’ Journey
An unforgettable adventure full of dangers awaits you and your companions. On your way, you will meet many enemies who will be so powerful that fighting them will consume a lot of energy. Are you brave enough to overcome evil and save the world?

Features:
🛡️ Heroic battles with various opponents
✨ Magic dice that differ in use and skills
⚔️ Many playable heroes
💥 Power-Ups that diversify the gameplay
🎲 Upgrade the power of magic dice
🗡️ Expand the potential of your team
🕸️ A world full of dangers and dark secrets
🧭 50+ stages
🐉 Dungeon Boss fights
🏆 Rewards for each battle won

The time has come. Fight with others for the freedom of the whole world!

name: Dice & Spells

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7x64 / Windows 8.1x64 / Windows 10x64
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Intel i3-equivalent processor or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or better, Radeon HD 2000 or better, Intel HD 4000 / IvyBridge or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10x64 or higher
  • Processor: 2.7 GHz Intel i5-equivalent processor or higher
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 700 or better, Radeon HD 8000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Dice & Spells is a 2D hand-drawn dark fantasy game based on combat mechanics using random incidents. Immerse yourself in turn-based gameplay and progress through the levels, upgrading heroes and dice. Face the undead mythical creatures, and don't die too fast. Are you willing to take risks?
